title: Egnate Fifia House Museum
about: Egnate Fifia House Museum is located in Samegrelo, in the municipality of Tsalenjikha, in the village of Chkvaleri. In the museum, there are preserved the memorial subjects of Georgian surgeon, the member of the Science Academy- Egnate Fifia. Egnate Fifia made a magnificent contribution to the development of Georgian Medicine, he is even known as the “King of Georgian Medicine”. The museum is especially important for those, who are interested in science.
